1.description: Read a Book! Photograph the team reading a book in the library

2.description: Instagram Pic! Take an artsy insta-pic under the Irish-Bend Covered Bridge.

3.description: Campus Brochure! Photograph a human pyramid of the team in front of OSU's iconic Weatherford Hall.

4.description: Obstacle Course! Complete the whole USMC obstacle training course. Get video evidence.

5.description: Travel Abroad! Learn a non-English greeting from a student at the International Living Learning Center. Take a video saying the word.

6.description: Go Greek! Find the most frequent greek letter on Greek row. Take a picture of the letter.

7.description: Night Life! Photograph the team with an employee at Clodfelters.

8.description: School Spirit! Photograph the team trying something on from the Beaver Store.

9.description: Make a Friend! Video a secret handshake with a stranger.

10.description: Stay Safe! Pick-up a free contraceptive from Student Health Services. Make sure to capture the moment.
